name: Scrabby - The Climate Ranger
description:
A game made during a polish game jam #zostanwdomurobgry. A purpose of this adventure is to save broken climate of the world with funny snowman called Scrabby. Just throw some snowballs at those folks!

Here's a link to a gameplay video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kIGGh98Zf8o&feature=youtu.be

- - - - - - - - - - -

Music:"Foam Rubber" by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
